net.corda.core.concurrent

Class ConcurrencyUtils

  • net.corda.core.concurrent.ConcurrencyUtils

  • public class ConcurrencyUtils

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <V,W> CordaFuture<W> firstOf(CordaFuture<V>[] futures, Function1<? super net.corda.core.concurrent.CordaFuture<? extends V>,? extends W> handler)
      As soon as a given future becomes done, the handler is invoked with that future as its argument. The result of the handler is copied into the result future, and the handler isn't invoked again. If a given future errors after the result future is done, the error is automatically logged.
      static <V,W> W match(java.util.concurrent.Future<V> $receiver, Function1<? super V,? extends W> success, Function1<? super java.lang.Throwable,? extends W> failure)
      Invoke KotlinUtilsKt.getOrThrow and pass the value/throwable to success/failure respectively.

    • Method Detail

      • match

        public static <V,W> W match(java.util.concurrent.Future<V> $receiver,
                            Function1<? super V,? extends W> success,
                            Function1<? super java.lang.Throwable,? extends W> failure)

        Invoke KotlinUtilsKt.getOrThrow and pass the value/throwable to success/failure respectively.

        See Also:
        KotlinUtilsKt.getOrThrow

      • firstOf

        public static <V,W> CordaFuture<W> firstOf(CordaFuture<V>[] futures,
                                           Function1<? super net.corda.core.concurrent.CordaFuture<? extends V>,? extends W> handler)

        As soon as a given future becomes done, the handler is invoked with that future as its argument. The result of the handler is copied into the result future, and the handler isn't invoked again. If a given future errors after the result future is done, the error is automatically logged.
